dcterms:creator: T. Murakami

dcterms:description: The dataset contains 18,489 pairs of time-series numerical sequences and market comments. The time-series numerical sequences are obtained from IBISquare, and stock price data are collected from December 2010 to September 2016. The comments are provided by Nikkei Quick News.
dcterms:title: Market Comment Dataset

dcterms:description: This dataset is used for generating market comments that refer to external resources, enhancing the context of the generated comments.
dcterms:title: Market Comment Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Hamazono
T. Ishigaki

I. Kobayashi
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the unpredictable attributes in market comment generation, providing insights into the variability of generated comments.
dcterms:title: Market Comment Dataset
